_sText:
Larger Map Battlefield 1942 with music (64 spawnpoints)

How to use the tank:
Placed on top of the tank and give the "E" and entering the driving mode (A,S,W,D) in order to leave return to give the "E" if you are in mode shot will not leave you.
Inside the driving mode of the tank with the right button of mouse we go into shooting mode (A,W,S,D) with the left mouse button to shoot and to return so driving right mouse button.


--- Changes to v4 ---

* New: More real tanks ( 1 player per tank controls driving and shot)
* Added: 2 (missile Batery) Hawk (Fix optimize)
* added: 2 (canon)
* Removed: 2 F-22 ( Not ay enough space to fly)


---Content---

* 3D Skybox
* 4 helicopters
* 4 Tanks - One canon
* 4 Tanks - Double cannon
* 4 Tank Rocket Launcher
* 2 Tank Missile
* 2 jeep wars
* 2 Canon
* 2 Rocket Launcher (4 shots Max)
* 2 Weapons Crossbows
* 2 Building - walls 30 max
* 1 robot
* Command & Conquer Buildings


Old version [mg_tankbase_v3](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/157446 "mg_tankbase_v3")

Mode: Knife Only

Note: noblock problem move cam tank
